00318 inline uint32
00319 ItemNames::getNbrStrings() const {
00320    return stringTable.getSize();
00321 }
00322 
00323 inline uint32
00324 ItemNames::getStringSize() {
00325    return sizeOfStrings;
00326 }

00328 inline char*
00329 ItemNames::getString(uint32 stringID) {
00330    if (stringID >= getNbrStrings())
00331       return (NULL);
00332    else
00333       return ((char*) stringTable.getElementAt(stringID));
00334 }

00336 inline char*
00337 ItemNames::getStringStart() {
00338    return theStrings;
00339 }
00340 
00341 
00342 inline uint32 
00343 ItemNames::getNbrBlocks() const 
00344 {
00345    return getNbrStrings() - nbrBlockedStrings + 1;
00346 }
00347 
00348 inline uint32 
00349 ItemNames::getBlockSize(uint32 blockNbr) const 
00350 {
00351    if (blockNbr == 0)
00352       return sizeOfBlock;
00353    else
00354       return strlen( (char*) stringTable.
00355                      getElementAt(blockNbr+nbrBlockedStrings-1));
00356 }
00357 
00358 inline char* 
00359 ItemNames::getBlockStart(uint32 blockNbr) const 
00360 {
00361    if (blockNbr == 0)
00362       return theStrings;
00363    else
00364       return (char*) stringTable.
00365                getElementAt(blockNbr+nbrBlockedStrings-1);
00366 }
